channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-12565] VectorUDAFCount.aggregateInputSelection does not handle isRepeated case
item.description:
Not handling the isRepeated case causes wrong results when column is null.

(Native Vector MapJoin OUTER JOIN operators will generate isRepeated null columns).
item.summary: VectorUDAFCount.aggregateInputSelection does not handle isRepeated case

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

mmccline, since Dec. 2 any commit to master is for 2.1.0, not 2.0.0 which is now in branch-2.0.

Sergey's message to dev@hive said: "branch-2.0 has been created as of git commit bbe23403cf34e27af04a271c49d484d2fbbd8656. Please use 2.1 fixVersion for master commits and backport JIRAs that should go into 2.0 release to the release branch."
